email_content:
Dear Mr. Thompson,

Thank you for reaching out and for considering TelNet Communications as your potential telecommunications partner.

Below is a concise overview of the core services and strengths we provide to growing businesses like yours:

• Dedicated Internet Access – Symmetrical bandwidth from 10 Mbps up to 100 Gbps, backed by an industry-leading 99.999 % uptime SLA.
• SD-WAN & Managed MPLS – Secure, application-aware connectivity for multi-site environments, with centralized policy management and real-time visibility.
• Voice & Collaboration – SIP trunking, hosted PBX, and Microsoft Teams Direct Routing to unify voice across all locations while cutting legacy costs.
• Cloud Connect – Private Layer-2 links into AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud, ensuring low-latency, predictable performance for critical workloads.
• 24 × 7 Network Operations Center – Proactive monitoring, automatic failover, and U.S.-based technical support available around the clock.

Scalability & Reliability
Our Tier-1 backbone spans more than 25,000 route-miles of fiber and is engineered with automatic path diversity. Bandwidth upgrades can be turned up on demand in most markets without additional hardware, allowing your connectivity to grow in lock-step with your business.

Representative Success Stories
• National Retailer – Consolidated 350 stores onto our SD-WAN, improving uptime from 96 % to 99.99 % while lowering monthly network costs by 22 %.
• Regional Healthcare System – Implemented encrypted MPLS and SIP trunking to support electronic health records and voice, maintaining full regulatory compliance.
• High-Growth Technology Firm – Scaled from 1 Gbps to 10 Gbps DIA in under 24 hours to meet a product-launch surge.

Next Steps
I would be happy to prepare a tailored proposal and pricing matrix once I have a few details such as the number of sites you plan to connect and your expected bandwidth range. Would you have 20 minutes for a quick call early next week? Feel free to suggest a convenient time, or you can book directly on my calendar here: https://calendly.com/jane-telnet/intro.

In the meantime, I’ve attached a brief service overview and case-study packet for your review. Please let me know if any additional information would be helpful.

Thank you again for your interest in TelNet Communications. I look forward to the possibility of working together.

Best regards,

Jane Doe
Strategic Account Executive
TelNet Communications
(o) 555-0123  |  (m) 555-0456
jane.doe@telnet-com.com  |  www.telnet-com.com
